name: Richie Bubbles Adventure
description:
The game Richie Bubbles Adventure is a 2D dexterity side scrolling action game for Android devices, whereby the user must touch two sides of the screen to move the platform and pop the bubbles, avoid obstacles and collect squares. This nice, simple, fun, and colourful game was developed for kids and adults of all ages. The three four-minute game sessions make it perfect for quick trips or for playing in short spare time. This action game doesn't require massive multi-finger coordination and much time concentration.

The colourful and juicy game design together with the famous Masha and The Bear cartoon sound track make this game really enjoyable and fun to play.
